body_html:
It isn't as easy as I thought to add the CUB version, the cub histogram doesn't support weights.

For now, it would be pretty easy to use unsorted_segment_sum to mimic a (possibly weighted) histogram. data=weights (could be all ones) and segment_ids=keys.
body_text:

For now, it would be pretty easy to use unsorted_segment_sum to mimic a (possibly weighted) histogram.  data=weights (could be all ones) and segment_ids=keys.
body:
It isn't as easy as I thought to add the CUB version, the cub histogram doesn't support weights.

For now, it would be pretty easy to use unsorted_segment_sum to mimic a (possibly weighted) histogram.  data=weights (could be all ones) and segment_ids=keys.
